name: Panguin Saves Christmas!
description:
Paguin the penguin was having a great day.  But Santa wasn't!

Santa accidentally crash landed on the South Pole!  In the crash he lost all his gifts AND his magical hat that lets his sleigh fly.  He can't get back until he gets his hat.  Paguin found his hat and wants to help Santa so Paguin helps Santa find the gifts and returns the hat to Santa!

All art was created by AvocadoFire for this game
